attributes.action: Change the address of the Russian Embassy
attributes.additional_details: The suffering Russia are currently bringing to Ukraine is deplorable. This change sets a gesture of defiance which I’m sure the British Public would support.
attributes.background: Change the 1st line address from ‘Kensington Place Garden’ to ‘Free Ukraine Garden’ so that any correspondence going to and from the Russian Embassy shows the wording ‘Free Ukraine’.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the naming of roads, this would be a matter for the local authority.
